medicalLanding.banner_subtitle: Obtén tu cita por medio de un chatbot, contacta a los mejores profesionales de la salud.
medicalLanding.about_subtitle: Puedes agendar 24/7 desde tu dispositivo móvil
medicalLanding.about_quote: Save time and money. Receive quality care, every time
medicalLanding.expertise_subtitle: Todos los profesionales registrados poseen años de experiencia en su área
medicalLanding.expertise_paragraph: Nos enfocamos en siempre tener un horario disponible para ti
medicalLanding.footer_paragraph: It's not too good to be true, it's just the way healthcare should be simple.
medicalLanding.feature_desc1: Our audience dashboard shows you pre-built segments like top locations, recent sources of growth, and even customer lifetime value (CLV).
medicalLanding.feature_desc2: With strong technical foundations, has allowed us to leverage business experts to build hundreds of improvements.
medicalLanding.feature_desc3: We empowers your marketing, sales and services teams to collaborate across the entire customer lifecycle for more meaningful, memorable experiences.
medicalLanding.pricing_subtitle: The best value designed for your workplace, starting at just $24/user/month.
medicalLanding.faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.
